title: New luxury house for sale
location: Koswatte Rd (200 meters to the main Nawala Rd), Nawala
details:
4 year old luxury house with stylish architecture and high quality finishing. Teak/Granite and high end tile finishes, Teak windows and doors, all toilet fittings are Grohe bought in Dubai. Beautiful wooden and toughened glass staircase (and provision for an elevator). Custom designed white formal pantry (by Euro Pantry) with Hafelle and Smeg fixtures and beautiful Mahogany pantry for daily cooking. Comprehensive security alarm system and camera system.

Living room opens to a garden terrace that has uninterrupted view of lush greenery (due to government reservation area). Split level gardens. Rooftop overlooking greenery and 360 degree view. Gated community with 20 to 30 ft access road and ample parking. Respectable neighborhood..

Can offer with (or without) high quality custom made teak furniture.

5 bedrooms
3 full bathrooms + 1 powder room
3 Living areas (welcome area, formal living, family area)
1 formal white pantry
1 everyday kitchen (Mahogany + Stylish black tiles)
1 laundry room
Roof top garden
1 maids room and maids bathroom
8 security cameras
Security alarm system
Hot water + Pressure pump
